DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Event Action Clinical Study Procedure Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the adverse event action that was taken with clinical study procedures.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Action taken in response to an unwanted effect caused by a drug or therapy. Such effects can be drug related, dose related, route related, patient related, caused by an interaction with another drug, or caused by opioid initiation or dose escalation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An unwanted effect caused by a drug or therapy.  Such effects can be drug related, dose related, route related, patient related, caused by an interaction with another drug, or caused by opioid initiation or dose escalation.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).

ObjectClass.changeDescription: Change concept code to C41331 as C2861 is retired per EVS. dw

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the outcome or resolution of the patient's adverse events.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._Any stepwise set of actions._A thing done._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added concept to value meaning. mc 3/20/12

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.: Any stepwise set of actions.: Not permanent; not lasting; lacking continuity or regularity.: To stop a process by imposing a freeze on it.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
Not permanent; not lasting; lacking continuity or regularity.
To stop a process by imposing a freeze on it.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed.: No longer participating in a study; not being followed and will not be retreated.

Concepts.definition: Some matter, situation, or event that is thought about, written about, or discussed.
No longer participating in a study; not being followed and will not be retreated.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: alteration or modification.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.:Any stepwise set of actions.:A thing done.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
